channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘She’s in a shaky marriage that could soon end’: Will my daughter’s husband get my IRA when I die?
item.description: “I’m 84 and widowed. My daughter is the beneficiary of my IRA and the successor trustee for my revocable living trust.”

item.title: Tesla stock gets punished as Musk says he’ll start third political party. ‘This is not the news we want to see.’
item.description: Tesla stock is weaker in premarket trade as investors react to Elon Musk’s announcement that he will form a new U.S. political party.

item.title: ‘We are blessed’: My husband is inheriting a $1 million home. Should he put it in my name too?
item.description: “We do not live in a community-property state. We have one son who is now a young adult.”

item.title: My job is offering me a payout. Should I take a $61,000 lump sum — or $355 a month for life?
item.description: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years.”

item.title: Forget the hype — real AI agents solve bounded problems, not open-world fantasies
